note: Wandering the tech world with a paintbrush in one hand and a dog leash in the other. Trees are my zen, and I'm always on the lookout for moments of awe. Troubled by existence but comforted by art.  Posts self-destruct after 6 months.  Most posts are about - #TechNews #art #dogsOfMastodon #Trees #Seattle #paintings #photography

Turns out I like an eclectic mix of serious news, lewd smut and good puns. Cats, food, and interesting art also tick my boxes. Big fan of good Alt text.

(Updated now I've been here a while and worked out how I want to use the 'don...)
